DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Metallic Powders - Metallic Copper C (1 oz/28 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Metallic Powders provide the shiniest most intense effects for body and face painting. They apply easily for light and sparkling designs and accents.
A little Mehron Metal Powder goes a long way. It is ultra fine and can be used in a variety of ways. Use it alone for translucent shimmer or combine it with Mehron Mixing Liquid (sold separately) to form metallic liquid makeup that coats for an intense dynamic finish. Though it covers opaquely, it washes off easily.
Comes in a 28 gram size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce (28 gm) container of Mehron Metallic Copper Powder will apply about 100 eyeliners up to 1/2 a body
Powered metals, Mehron Metallic Powders are ultra fine and the effects are startling
Can be used alone or with Mehron Mixing Liquid (sold separately) to make liquid metallic makeup
Use as an accent to face and body designs
